pyproject.toml.description: pyproject.toml uses poetry with categorized dependencies (FastAPI/web, Database, AWS, Utilities, Logging). Added rate limiting section for slowapi.

backend/core/config.py.description: Settings class using Pydantic Settings with SettingsConfigDict. Includes rate_limit_auth_endpoints (10/minute), rate_limit_execution_endpoints (5/minute), rate_limit_read_endpoints (100/minute), and optional redis_url. Global settings instance exported.
